title: Should We Build Walls or Bridges?
itunes:title: Should We Build Walls or Bridges?
description: Friends, our first reading this Sunday reminds us that we need walls to maintain our identity. But our ultimate purpose is not to hunker down behind those walls, but to go out and transform the world. We need both the walls that define who we are, and the bridges that allow us to bring the light of Christ to all the nations.
